humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The word "Yinshi" is often seen in Bronze, pronounced as "Yinshi", which means an official (Sun Yirang). It also means the descendants of Zhongshan King Yuanhu: "Yin Si".

"Said Wen": "Yin, descendants and descendants. From the flesh; from the eight, the elephant is long; from the Yao, the elephant is heavy and tired. 𦞩, ancient prose 𦙍." Duan Yucai's note: ""Interpretation": "Yin, heir, successor." "Daya. Mao Chuan": "Yin, heir.""
humanum_short_description_en: Bronze inscriptions from " eight " from " unitary " to " flesh ", the initial meaning of the configuration is unknown. Chen Bingxin believes that it will be a continuation of the distribution of flesh and blood.
humanum_full_description:
金文多見「胤士」一詞，讀為「尹士」，表示官士(孫詒讓)。又表示後代，中山王圓壺：「胤嗣」。

　　《說文》：「胤，子孫相承續也。从肉；从八，象其長也；从幺，象重累也。𦞩，古文𦙍。」段玉裁注：「《釋詁》：『胤、嗣，繼也。』《大雅．毛傳》：『胤，嗣也。』」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「八」從「幺」從「肉」，構形初義不明，陳秉新認為會血肉分派如糸之延續之意，姑備一說。

金文多見「胤士」一詞，讀為「尹士」，表示官士(孫詒讓)。又表示後代，中山王圓壺：「胤嗣」。 《說文》：「胤，子孫相承續也。从肉；从八，象其長也；从幺，象重累也。𦞩，古文𦙍。」段玉裁注：「《釋詁》：『胤、嗣，繼也。』《大雅．毛傳》：『胤，嗣也。』」
Elaboration: The word "Yinshi" is often seen in Bronze, pronounced as "Yinshi", which means an official (Sun Yirang). It also means the descendants of Zhongshan King Yuanhu: "Yin Si". "Said Wen": "Yin, descendants and descendants. From the flesh; from the eight, the elephant is long; from the Yao, the elephant is heavy and tired. 𦞩, ancient prose 𦙍." Duan Yucai's note: ""Interpretation": "Yin, heir, successor." "Daya. Mao Chuan": "Yin, heir.""

胤字的基本解释

胤
yìn
后代：胤嗣（后嗣）。

胤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yìn］
［《廣韻》羊晉切，去震，以。］
(1)后嗣；子嗣。
(2)谓立嫡长子为太子或世子。
(3)犹言身孕。
(4)继承；延续。
(5)演，演奏。
(6)引。乐曲体裁之一。
(7)古国名。见《书·胤征序》孔传。

胤字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　胤； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页980第04
〔古文〕?【廣韻】羊晉切【正韻】羊進切，?音孕。【說文】子孫相承續也。从肉从八，象其長也。幺亦象重累也。【廣韻】繼也，嗣也。【書·洛誥】予乃胤保，大相東土。【傳】我乃繼文武安天下之道，大相洛邑。又【高宗肜日】王司敬民，罔非天胤。【傳】王者主民，當敬民事。民事無失天所嗣常也。　又習也。【詩·大雅】永錫祚胤。【傳】胤，習也。　又【廣韻】國名。【書·胤征】胤侯命掌六師。　又姓。　又【韻補】叶延去聲。【徐幹·齊都賦】旣墜反升，將絕復胤。叶下徧。

胤字的源字形

胤字的起名意思

：指从肉，从八，从幺。肉表示血统关系，幺表示重叠，八表示延长，合起来表示后代；也指子孙相承。

Yin
yìn
Offspring: Yin heir (heir).
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yìn］
["Guang Yun" Yang Jin cut, go to shake, to. ]
(1) Heir; heir.
(2) It is said that the eldest son is the prince or the eldest son.
(3) Still pregnant.
(4) Succession; continuation.
(5) Acting, playing.
(6) Cited. One of the genres of music.
(7) Ancient country name. See "Book · Yinzheng Preface" Kong Chuan.

[Not set next] [Meat word department] 　胤; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 980 04
[Ancient text]? [Guang Yun] Sheep Jin cut [Zheng Yun] Sheep cut in, sound pregnant. [Said the text] The descendants of the descendants also continue. From the flesh to the eight, as it grows. Yao is also tired. [Guang Yun] Succession and succession. [Book·Luogao] Yu Nai Yinbao, great Xiang Dongtu. [Biography] I am following the way of civil and military peace in the world, Daxiang Luoyi. Also [Gao Zong Zong Ri] Wang Si Jingmin, nothing but Tianyin. [Biography] The king is in charge of the people, and the civil is respected. Civil is always the same.　Xi Ye. 【Poetry·Daya】Yongxi Zuoyin. [Biography] Yin, Xi Ye.　[Guangyun] The name of the country. 【Book·Yinzheng】Yinhou ordered the six divisions.　Another last name.　【Rhyme Filling】Ye Yan goes. [Xu Gan·Qi Du Fu] Falling back and rising, will never recover Yin. Yexia over.
Yin
Source glyph
Yin
Name meaning
: Refers to Cong Rou, Cong Ba, Cong Yao. Flesh means blood relationship, unitary means overlap, eight means extension, together means offspring; also means inheritance from descendants.

胤 yin
劇
文
胤
本义是“子孙相承续也”(《说
文》)。“月”(即“肉”)表示骨肉相连
的血缘关系;“么”(意思是丝),表示
连绵不断;“八”(意思是分),表示分
枝繁衍。也指“后代”。《诗经》:“君
书
亂
子万年,永锡祚。”

公月
(недостаток)
Инь Инь
драма
Текст
Инь
Первоначальное значение - «потомки Сянчэна тоже продолжают» («Шуовэнь»).
«Юэ» (т.е. «плоть») означает кровное родство, связанное плотью и кровью; «Я» (означает шелк) означает непрерывный; «八» (означает цент) означает очки
Филиалы множатся.
Также относится к «потомству».
«Книга песен»: «Тысячелетний джентльмен, Юн Сицзуо».
